title: Acadia National Park: Eating & Sleeping
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Eating & Sleeping             Eating & Sleeping       Park Campgrounds Spring, summer, winter, or fall- this covers them all. Private Campgrounds There are a number of private campgrounds in the area.  Eating Popovers, lobster, and more. Lodging No lodging is located within Acadia National Park. Contact area chambers of commerce for lodging information for the area.
